nodes.text: 3B3 was a B1-Series battle droid produced by Baktoid Combat Automata that served with the Trade Federation Droid Army prior to and during the Invasion of Naboo. The name was a shortened version of the droid's full serial number.

Following the Fall of Theed, 3B3 intercepted Jedi Master Qui-Gon Jinn, his Padawan Obi-Wan Kenobi and their navigator, Jar Jar Binks, as the trio emerged from a Tribubble bongo on the Solleu River in Theed. Jinn destroyed 3B3 and continued with his mission to rescue Queen Amidala.
